name: Arq
description:
Arq is a brief, 2D puzzle-adventure game inspired by the Legend of Zelda series. Explore a forest-themed puzzle dungeon of increasing difficulty and try to reach the end!

Credits:

Tiny RPG Forest assets by ansimuz licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International

Gem sprites recolored to gray-scale

Berkshire Swash font (pixelated for the game's logo) by Astigmatic

VT123 font by Peter Hull

Music by DB

Sound effects generated with bfxr

Game and additional art assets by Joshua Whittom
